title: Suspect in Portland Protest Shooting Charged With Murder
sub_head: Oregon man allegedly opened fire on a group of demonstrators, killing one and wounding four others, police say
body:
An Oregon man accused of killing a woman and wounding four other people during a weekend protest in Portland now faces charges of murder and assault.
The fatal shooting began Saturday evening when Benjamin Smith, 43 years old, allegedly approached a group of demonstrators gathered in a local park, Portland police said in a statement. The focus of the demonstration couldnâ€™t be confirmed.
